name: Deathly Inversion
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Up to three creatures within range must succeed on a Willpower saving throw or have their existence poisoned such that healing becomes lethal harm. For the duration of the spell, the next 100 hit points of healing they would receive instead damages them for the same amount.

A creature taking a break can spend hit dice to remove part of the effect without further damage. Each hit die spent removes 20 points from the threshold.
empower: Choose one: range increased to 120 feet, or target two more creatures, or increase threshold to 150 hit points.
